p: Equal volumes (1 mL) of the prepared cell suspensions in yeast extract-peptone-dextrose (YPD) medium as explained previously were added to each C. verum leaf oil treatment and mixed thoroughly. All treatments were then incubated aerobically at 37ÂºC, without shaking, and were sampled at 0 h, 2 h, 4 h and 6 h after mixing thoroughly.
